title: EUCAP Sahel Niger: Council nearly doubles mission's annual budget (Council of the European Union)
text: ( Source : Council of the European Union ) Niger is facing security threats including terrorism, illegal trafficking of drugs, weapons and people, in particular in Northern Agadez , and is also a major regional transit hub for irregular
